Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/List/toSet

Synopsis Convert a list to a set.
Function set[&T] toSet(list[&T] lst)
Description Convert lst to a set.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>toSet([10, 20, 30, 40]);
set[int]: {30,10,40,20}
rascal>toSet(["a", "b", "c"]);
set[str]: {"c","b","a"}
